summary:
Well, well, well! Here we go again! I have to say, I was not planing on doing this, but I was bored and I just started and so after 14h of work, here we have a new and, honsetly, a lot better version of the Arcadia's Cauldron! I also added a nice little something to the name. I like doing that!
<br /><br /><
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=6][font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][b][size=5]– Generals –[/size][/b][/color][/font][/size][/size]

[size=3][size=3]This is a re-upload![/size] Genius that I am, instead off unhiding the mod after editing and updating it, I clicked delete instead of unhide. I am really sorry about this! Maybe I should not work and watch TV half asleep while updating my mods!
Again, I am really sorry!

If you like this mod,
PLEASE FOLLOW MY BLOG: [url=http://iwilliblecha.wordpress.com/]http://iwilliblecha.wordpress.com/ [/url]
AND/OR MY FACEBOOK PAGE: [url=https://www.facebook.com/iwilliblecha]https://www.facebook.com/iwilliblecha [/url]
TO STAY IN TOUCH WITH MY WORK![/size]

Well, well, well! Here we go again! I have to say, I was not planing on doing
this, but I was bored and I just started and so after 14h of work, here
we have a new and, honsetly, a lot better version of the Arcadia's
Cauldron! I also added a nice little something to the name. I like doing
that!
But lets talk about the mod. The mod is meant to add a more...... I frankly dont really now what kind of feeling it should add.
I just started and I ended up with this.
The Mod adds a lot of fancy fancy to the shop. I went a bit crazy with the shelves.... I think.. But again, I like it.
Also I tried to add custom background music like I did back in the days when
I made The Bosmeric Drunken Huntsman, but it does not work..... at
least not always. Sometimes it worked, then again it doesnt. No idea
why, but thats just how it is.... sadly.
So, before I just talk endless here and we all know, most of you dont even read this, let me just say:

I hope you like it!
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[youtube]3b8gkVC_kH8[/youtube][youtube]x_9VuPgGWYk[/youtube]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– REQUIREMENTS –[/b][/size][/color][/font]

• Skyrim with latest patch

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– General Informations – [/b][/size][/color][/font]

• The Mod has been cleaned and checked for Errors with TES5Edit!
• No undeleted NevMesh errors!
• I can not promise the custom music will play inside, for some reason it is very buggy, even for me.
• Every bottle inside is an item, therfore you can steal it. There are no
flying items for me so far, but I cant promise anything.
• By default, this mod is NOT compatible with any lightning mods OR mods that alter the design of this shop!
• I left a tutorial in the comments section on how to make the mod work with lightning mods.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[size=5][b][font=Arial][color=#1e84cc]– FEATURES –[/color][/font][/b][/size]

• A completely new look for Arcadia's Cauldron.
• A new, amazing layout! Comes with a lot of fancy fancy that will make any vanilla shop looks like the work of a 3 year old.
• More lights, plants and a lot of items!
• Better NevMeshes.
• Custom music playing in the background. Sadly not fully working atm.
• Shelves! A LOT OF SHELVES AND PLANTS!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=#1e84cc][b][font=Arial][size=5]– RECOMMENDED MODS – [/size][/font][/b][/color]

Mods made by my huble self:

• aMidianBorn Book of Silence[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/...[/url]

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

• And again, I will already thank Hodilton for a video. What would or community be without him?

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– FAQs –[/b][/size][/color][/font]

Q: Why arent your mods compatible with ELFX, etc?
A: Because when you change the layout, you have to change the lightning too! But I provided you with an easy and fast way to make them compatible! If it is still too much work, please just go away and dont bother me again! Thank you!

Q: Will you ever do a shop that is not in Whiterun?
A: Yes, after Whiterun is done. I love Whiterun.

Q: Does the mod work with "insert light overhaul here?
A: No, but you can use TEs5Edit to make them work! I have added a sticky
post to the comments which should tell you how to do it!

Q: Will you make a bundle with all your mods?
A: Yes! I am already working on it! Expect it soon!

Q: Can I use your mod, upload your mod, etc?
A: Check the "use my work" section on my blog!!

Q: I would have an idea for a mod!
A: Great, then download CK and begin to work on it ;) I dont do requests!

Q: What ENB/Textures/etc?
A: I will make a list....
author: Helixien
